title: BRIEF-Standard Life Aberdeen Announces Sale Of Shares In HDFC Life Insurance By Standard Life (Mauritius Holdings) 2006 Ltd
text:
BRIEF-Standard Life Aberdeen Announces Sale Of Shares In HDFC Life Insurance By Standard Life (Mauritius Holdings) 2006 Ltd

Stock Markets 14 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 14:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Standard Life Aberdeen Announces Sale Of Shares In HDFC Life Insurance By Standard Life (Mauritius Holdings) 2006 Ltd Oct 30 (Reuters) - Standard Life Aberdeen : * SALE OF SHARES IN HDFC LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY LIMITED BY STANDARD LIFE (MAURITIUS HOLDINGS) 2006 LIMITED * SLMH06 SOLD 100,000,000 SHARES IN HDFC LIFE AT AVERAGE PRICE OF RS 575.15 WHICH WILL RESULT IN SLMH06 GETTING ABOUT RS 57.0BN * SLMH06'S REMAINING SHAREHOLDING IN HDFC LIFE IS NOW 14.74%, BASED ON PAID-UP, ISSUED EQUITY SHARE CAPITAL

BRIEF-Standard Life Aberdeen Announces Sale Of Shares In HDFC Life Insurance By Standard Life (Mauritius Holdings) 2006 Ltd
